name: Make Expression - Face puzzle
description:
Manipulate the arrows that appear on your face!
Funerals, dates, weddings... what do you look like in these situations?

This is a game to make the right expression for the scene!
Try to make the expression you make when you are sad or happy. It's fun to make different expressions.

EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
